item.description:
Although it's an atheist event (and not exclusively objectivist), there are plenty of interested people so I'm going ahead and scheduling the meetup.

Julia Sweeney, former Saturday Night Live comedian, is performing her new play, Letting Go of God at Harvard's Sanders Theatre on Thursday October 26, 8pm. For tickets call the Harvard Box Office at 617.496.2222.

More info on the play is here:
http://upcoming.org/e...

We're meeting at Fire + Ice in Harvard Square at 6 pm for dinner before the show. (I'll be wearing dollar sign bling bling!) And if anyone wants to just join us for dinner and skip the show (or vice versa) that's fine, too. See you soon!

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: julia sweeney's play "letting go of god" -- meeting for dinner before the show
